name: Four survivors
description:
FOUR SURVIVORS

----------WARNINGS------------

Due to the limited development time, we are unable to make everything running. Please enjoy all the bugs.

------------------------------

Description:

-This is an island survival simulation game.

-After an airplane crash on an island , only four people survived and you are controlling them (Eric, Eason, Brody, Kevin) to do various actions.

Your Goal:

-At least one character survives for 40 days and someone will come to save you, the more characters survived, the higher the score.

Game Control:

-Use WASD or arrow keys to look around the island

-Left-click on the each character on the character panel(Bottom left) to select the current character

-Left-click on various area on the island to select actions to perform
